title: The Loyal 47 Ronin{Chushingura}(1962)
description:
AKA:
Chushingura - Hana no maki yuki no maki (1962) 
47 Ronin
47 Samurai (USA)
Chushingura: 47 Samurai (USA) (reissue title)
The 47 Ronin (Australia)
The Loyal 47 Ronin 

I personally have seen 5 versions of this legend and understand there are several more.  The re-release that I am seeding is the one with Koshiro Matsumoto as Chamberlain Kuranosuke Oishi.  It shows Torshiro Mifune on the cover but while I am a major fan of his, this is not his movie.  He has a side part but is the most famous of the actors.  It is over 3 1/2 hours long with hard encoded English subs.
I would have to say that for me this is the best as it captures the spirit and soul of those involved.  

I will be adding classic style action films from Japan, China, Korea and Thailand.  
All will be DVD-R

M. Stryder North
